channel.title: [Pi 317] Is there a way to fix this? [Pi 317]
channel.description: My server is very laggy... is there a code to fix this?

item.title: [Pi 317] Is there a way to fix this? [Pi 317]
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:431792”]Where there’s a will, there’s a way.

There is no “code” to fix this, in the sense of something that you can copy paste into your server. Most of the lag issue results from poor server design, and then building on top of that.[/quote]

i said almost that exact thing on another thread. lol.

Read full topic
item.source: [Pi 317] Is there a way to fix this? [Pi 317]

Where there’s a will, there’s a way.

There is no “code” to fix this, in the sense of something that you can copy paste into your server. Most of the lag issue results from poor server design, and then building on top of that.
